Class CharacterUtil

    Static helper for character handling routines.

    Olivier Wehner

    • Method Detail

      • countLinebreaks

        public static int countLinebreaks(char[] buffer,
                  int offset,
                  int length)
        Returns the number of line breaks (\n, \r or combination thereof) found in the specified buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - where to look
        offset - where to start looking
        length - how many characters to test
        Returns:
        number of line breaks found, counting \n\r (and \r\n) as a single linebreak

      • countLinebreaks

        public static CharacterUtil.LineCount countLinebreaks(java.io.InputStream instream)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the number of lines (\n, \r or combination thereof) found in the specified input and its type.
        Parameters:
        instream - where to look
        Returns:
        number of line breaks found, counting \r\n (and \n\r) as a single linebreak
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the stream throws one

      • reportIllegalCharacter

        public static void reportIllegalCharacter(char[] text,
                          int offset,
                          int length,
                          java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder,
                          int firstLine,
                          MessageBox messageBox,
                          Localizer localizer)
        Find the position of the first illegal character for the present encoding (if any) and write a suitable message to the message sink.
        Parameters:
        text - to be scanned for illegal characters
        offset - where to start scanning
        length - how many characters to scan
        encoder - encoder to be used for testing
        firstLine - number of first line
        messageBox - where to write the message to
        localizer - to be used for translations

      • flatWhiteSpace

        public static java.lang.String flatWhiteSpace(java.lang.String raw)
        Replaces every sequence of whitespace characters with a single blank (" ").
        Parameters:
        raw - to be flattend
        Returns:
        raw string with linebreaks, tabs and ws sequeces transformed to single blank

      • isLineBreakChar

        public static boolean isLineBreakChar(char c)
        Returns true if the specified character is a linefeed (LF) or a carriage return (CR).
        Parameters:
        c - to be tested
        Returns:
        true if LF or CR

      • getCharsetList

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset[] getCharsetList(java.util.List<java.nio.charset.Charset> availableCharsets,
                                        java.nio.charset.Charset actualCharset)
        Returns the supplied List as an array, and guarantees that the specified actual Charset is contained.
        Parameters:
        availableCharsets - list to be returned as array, actual Charset included
        actualCharset - the one charset that must be included in the list
        Returns:
        charset list as array with actual charset included
